data: As the day was now waning apace, and I was still unprovided with any one who could act as my second, I set out upon a search through the various large hotels in the neighbourhood, trusting that amid my numerous acquaintance I should be fortunate enough to find some of them at Paris.
The Confessions of Harry Lorrequer â€” Volume 5
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
